p: Stability studies for the optimized formulation F3 were conducted at 4 °C and 25 °C for one month, the results are illustrated in Table 5. Insignificant alterations were detected in the droplet size, PDI and entrapment efficiency of loratadine and sulpiride ( p > .05). Additionally, the appearance of the studied nanoemulsion persisted with lower cloudiness and absence of phase separation till the end of the study time.
